Greetings,  Bonjour, Вітаю, День Добрый !

I'm is a Scientist at  the Canada Border Services Agency, and Adjunct Professor at the University of Ottawa , working in the area of biometrics, video surveilllance and automated border control.

I am also the inventor of the Nouse™ (Nose as Mouse) technology, which is the Ontario Ministry of Health approved hands-free mouse alternative for users with disabilities and co-founder of IVIM Inc. Among other things, I couch gymnastics and compose songs.

Where to go from here:

For  professional and academic work: go to  science.gorodnichy.ca (mirrored at www.videorecognition.com).
There you will find presentations and papers about my work, as well as some fun scientific stuff. My bio and publications are also available at LinkedIn and Research Gate.

To learn more about Nouse™ and download it to help someone around you: go to www.nouse.ca.

For  family and creative projects: go to music.gorodnichy.ca. 

We speak english, français,українською и по русски and can be reached at [name]@gorodnichy.ca or [name]@ivim.ca.

Enjoy your visit!
